Text: Watching this episode - Barry Weiss gives Dave Hester the 'Yuuuuup' cap to wear instead of his 'Dave Hester Auctions' hat - but he's been wearing that for quite a while, so this one is definitely filmed out of order. It'd be nice for them to be shown in the order filmed - because then you can track the bidders progress better to see who's gradually climbing the ladder and who's falling down it. At this point I think Jarred and Brandi still just have one side of their store and I'm not sure about whether Darrell has divorced yet.
